dialog.text: Why does my shadow feel like an enemy when it's inside me?
dialog.instructions: Accent: neutral; Emotional range: anxious, small; Intonation: rising question; Impressions: unsure child; Speed: slow; Tone: tentative; Whispering: slight

dialog.text: Because you built walls around it and called silence protection. Shadows respond to exile with noise.
dialog.instructions: Accent: calm, gentle; Emotional range: steady, kind; Intonation: low, clarifying; Impressions: ancient, patient; Speed: measured; Tone: warm; Whispering: no

dialog.text: But it shouts at night. It makes me ashamed of things I can't change.
dialog.instructions: Accent: breathy; Emotional range: hurt, fearful; Intonation: compressed; Impressions: childlike vulnerability; Speed: slow; Tone: aching; Whispering: yes

dialog.text: Shame is the echo of what was never held. When you refuse the part, it screams for attention.
dialog.instructions: Accent: soft, grounding; Emotional range: compassionate, firm; Intonation: even; Impressions: mirrorlike; Speed: steady; Tone: reassuring; Whispering: no

dialog.text: How do I stop being afraid of my own voice when it comes from that place?
dialog.instructions: Accent: small earnest; Emotional range: hopeful under fear; Intonation: hopeful question; Impressions: curious boy; Speed: slow; Tone: sincere; Whispering: slight

dialog.text: You start by apologizing — not with slogans, but with presence. Sit. Breathe. Meet the pain without fixing it.
dialog.instructions: Accent: warm, encouraging; Emotional range: calm, inviting; Intonation: instructive soft; Impressions: teacher to child; Speed: slow; Tone: patient; Whispering: no

dialog.text: (Breath) I feel a knot behind my ribs, like a locked door...
dialog.instructions: Accent: exhale between words; Emotional range: vulnerable, raw; Intonation: trailing; Impressions: honest confession; Speed: very slow; Tone: trembling; Whispering: yes

dialog.text: Look at that knot. Say what you couldn't say before: 'I was scared. I'm sorry I left you to shout alone.'
dialog.instructions: Accent: steady encouragement; Emotional range: gentle authority; Intonation: guiding cadence; Impressions: steady lighthouse; Speed: measured; Tone: inviting; Whispering: no

dialog.text: I... I'm sorry. I'm sorry I pretended you weren't part of me.
dialog.instructions: Accent: breaking, soft; Emotional range: release, remorse; Intonation: falling into relief; Impressions: small surrender; Speed: slow; Tone: honest; Whispering: yes

dialog.text: Hear how the voice changes when it's acknowledged. The shadow never wanted punishment — only to be known.
dialog.instructions: Accent: tender, slightly amazed; Emotional range: warm, hopeful; Intonation: uplift; Impressions: witness; Speed: calm; Tone: comforting; Whispering: no

dialog.text: It feels quieter now, like someone finally knocking was answered.
dialog.instructions: Accent: soft wonder; Emotional range: surprised relief; Intonation: light rising; Impressions: child noticing magic; Speed: steady; Tone: relieved; Whispering: slight

dialog.text: Every small apology loosens a chain. The work isn't to banish darkness but to sit with it until it remembers its place beside your light.
dialog.instructions: Accent: resonant, calm; Emotional range: wise, encouraging; Intonation: steady, inspiring; Impressions: elder guide; Speed: measured; Tone: uplifting; Whispering: no

dialog.text: I think I'm starting to remember who I am when I hold all of me.
dialog.instructions: Accent: soft certainty; Emotional range: peaceful, renewed; Intonation: warm; Impressions: reclaimed boy; Speed: relaxed; Tone: content; Whispering: no

dialog.text: Tonight, offer a silent apology to the parts you ignored. Sit with them. Breathe. Share what shifts below — leave a thought in the comments so others know they're not alone.
dialog.instructions: Accent: inviting, gentle urgency; Emotional range: compassionate, motivating; Intonation: kind call-to-action; Impressions: subtle guide encouraging community; Speed: calm; Tone: warm invitation; Whispering: no
